title: The Gravel Cycling Hall of Fame is Now Accepting Nominations for 2025
content:
Nominations for athletes, event organizers, innovators, storytellers, and advocates who have left a mark in gravel cycling will be accepted from Nov. 1-30, 2024.

Read the full article at The Gravel Cycling Hall of Fame is Now Accepting Nominations for 2025 on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
